General.Name: Trisula International Tbk
General.Description: PT Trisula International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, designs and manufactures garments in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Manufacturing, Distribution, Uniform, and Retail. The company manufactures garments for products, such as jackets, ladies bottom, casual wear, men's trousers, corporate uniform, and functional clothing; lower garment products and golf sportswear; and corporate uniforms for banks, hotels, governmental agencies, and airlines. It owns and operates 160 outlets; and distributes garments to department stores and retail outlets. The company also markets its products through yukshopping.com; and e-commerce platforms such as Shopee, Lazada, Zalora, Tokopedia, Blibli, Bukalapak, and JD.id. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Trisula International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Trisula Insan Tiara.
